CustomField.description: This field specifies how many times the point scoring rule will run.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 'Only Once Per User' means the point scoring rule will run once for each matching user. 'Once Per each Member Matching Rule record matched to the User' means the rule will run as many times as the number of records a user is matched to by Matching Rules
CustomField.label: Number of Times to Run This Rule
